title: Uber suspends Uber Pool shared rides in the U.S. and Canada to help limit coronavirus spread
description: Uber has suspended its shared ‘Uber Pool’ class of rides, the company announced on Tuesday. The Uber Pool option would match up to three passengers together in one vehicle based on their destination, and Uber said in a statement from Uber Rides and Platform V…
